AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Your Dexterity and Charisma scores increase by 1.

Feature.Name: Size
Feature.Text: Changelings are built much like humans, but a little leaner. Your size is Medium.

SpeedFeature.Name: Speed
SpeedFeature.Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

SkillProficiencyFeature.Name: Duplicity
SkillProficiencyFeature.Text: You gain proficiency in the Deception skill.

Feature.Name: Shapechanger
Feature.Text: As an action, you can polymorph into any humanoid of your size that you have seen, or back into your true form. However, your equipment does not change with you. If you die, you revert to your natural appearance.

LanguageChoiceFeature.Name: Languages
LanguageChoiceFeature.Text: You can speak, read, and write Common and two other languages of your choice.
